column2:
"Welcome back, <%me>.
Did you help out those rookies like I told you to?"
"Everyone starts at the bottom. It's up to those with more experience to help newbies in need. You got that?"
"...Well, from where I'm standing, you look like you still have a lot of learning to do too."

"Anyway, at least you came back in one piece, <%me>.
Thank goodness for small miracles."
